title: AirBNB= Horror Movie Villain, LA Politicians = Real Movie Villains
itunes:title: AirBNB= Horror Movie Villain, LA Politicians = Real Movie Villains
description:
In episode 1349, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and host of Rhythm and Bae, Jasmine Ellis, to discuss…. Could the Trump Document Thing Be This Dumb? NOPE! Thanks NYT! LA City Council Sounds Like the Movies! The Best Modern Horror Movie Villain Is … Airbnb? And more!

  1. Could the Trump Document Thing Be This Dumb? NOPE! Thanks NYT!
  2. Breaking down crucial moments in the racist leaked recording of L.A. councilmembers
  3. Council President Martinez on DA Gascón: ‘F**k That Guy…He’s with the Blacks.’
  4. The Best Modern Horror Movie Villain Is … Airbnb?
  5. Barbarian and the rise of the Airbnb horror movie
  6. Why movies about deadly Airbnbs hit such a nerve right now

LISTEN: No Me Quieres (feat. Fabi Reyna) by Sumohair

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
